page.title: 07A HEADMASTER'S DAY(2nd JULY)
page.content: At Swinnerton by 8.35 and read the post.Talked to some parents and teachers until Assembly time(9.10)Then more post and document reading until 10.00 when I taught my Maths group. At breaktime toured the corridor and at 11.00 took trip money to bank.At 11.20 walked round the school to check all was well,wrote letters,reports and interviewed a parent. During dinner time patrolled the premises,preventing and dealing with trouble. During afternoon discussed building problems with the architect,and made some phone calls, talked sternly to a child,and sorted out time table problems. After break taught Gymnastics to the 1st Year group.3.30_4.30 more writing, phone calls,talked with caretaker and signed some leters.Today was a quiet day!! .
